00042 void CarCharacter::draw() {
00043     glPushMatrix(); {
00044         glColor3d(1,1,1);
00045 
00046         //Make it big (or small)
00047         glScaled(scaleFactor, scaleFactor, scaleFactor);
00048 /*
00049         glRotated(rotX, 1,0,0);
00050         glRotated(rotY, 0,1,0);
00051         glRotated(rotZ, 0,0,1);
00052 */

00055

00057             myMesh->drawMesh();
00058         }
00059     }
